mapper.select: SELECT t.status, t.title, t.sale_bamboo, t.reg_date, (SELECT count(*) FROM bamboo_use bu WHERE bu.talent_no = t.talent_no) AS sell_Count FROM talent t WHERE t.seller_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY t.reg_date desc

SELECT t.title, t.sale_bamboo, b.purchase_date, TRUNC(sysdate) - TRUNC(b.purchase_date) as "REFUNDABLE_DATE" FROM talent t INNER JOIN bamboo_use b ON t.talent_no = b.talent_no WHERE b.buyer_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY b.purchase_date desc

SELECT r.status, t.title, t.sale_bamboo, r.submit_date, r.approve_date FROM talent_refund r INNER JOIN bamboo_use b ON r.purchase_no = b.purchase_no INNER JOIN talent t ON b.talent_no = t.talent_no WHERE b.buyer_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY r.submit_date desc

SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM talent WHERE status = '게시중' AND seller_id = #{memberID}) AS sell_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM talent WHERE status = '판매종료' AND seller_id = #{memberID}) AS sold_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM bamboo_use WHERE buyer_id = #{memberID}) AS buy_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM talent_refund t INNER JOIN bamboo_use b ON b.purchase_no = t.purchase_no WHERE t.status = '검토중' AND b.buyer_id = #{memberID}) AS refund_submit_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM talent_refund t INNER JOIN bamboo_use b ON b.purchase_no = t.purchase_no WHERE t.status = '환불완료' AND b.buyer_id = #{memberID}) AS refund_approve_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM talent_refund t INNER JOIN bamboo_use b ON b.purchase_no = t.purchase_no WHERE t.status = '반려' AND b.buyer_id = #{memberID}) AS refund_reject_count FROM dual
